headline: TJX’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: TJX’s first quarter results prompted a negative response from investors, despite revenue and profit meeting or exceeding Wall Street’s expectations. Management attributed the quarter’s performance to steady growth in customer traffic across all divisions and categories, with particular strength in the HomeGoods and international segments. CEO Ernie Herrman emphasized, “Comp sales grew 3% at the high-end of our plan, with every division, both in the U.S. and internationally, driving increases.” H

headline: TJX Companies (TJX) Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the 12 best consumer goods stocks billionaires are quietly buying. On June 10, the company announced a quarterly dividend of its common stock. The company is to pay a $0.425 a share dividend on September 4, 2025. The dividend is payable to shareholders of record as of August […]
